description: Provides a custom authentication backend so that users can signup to the sitevia their email address instead of a username. Also provides a set of standardtemplates and sane URL mappings for the whole registration workflow.
longdescription: Provides a custom authentication backend so that users can signup to the sitevia their email address instead of a username. Also provides a set of standardtemplates and sane URL mappings for the whole registration workflow.
